lyrics:
Haha

Watch this

And I,
And I wanna see you break it down,
For me, huh
Yes we in this private (Party)

'Cause I,
And I wanna see you break it down,
For me (Watch this)

You gonna sweat your outfit out trying to (Dance like me)
Ah
Freeze!
Like me
Ooh oh
Shawty

'Cause I,
'Cause I'm about to break it down,
On you (Haha)
I see you with your friends-you don't wanna get embarrassed ('Barrassed)
I know you sing my bling bling (Check out the karats)
'Cause I,
I'm about to break it down,
On you

Girl I been waiting all night to see you (Dance like me)
You gonna sweat your outfit out trying to (Dance like me)
Ah
Freeze!

'Cause we,

You ain't gotta say it

'Cause we,
You and me, (Me)
Can really break it down
Oh-oh
Oh-oh
Oh-oh

Ah (Oh)
Now freeze
Like me

Hey

And all my ladies pop-poppin'

1, 2, 3, 4
